body.name: Conliwell Rubber Pet Hair Removal Brush with Squeegee, Portable Detailing Lint Remover, Soft Push Broom for Fluff Carpet, Hardwood, Tile, Window
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 6 mins
features: 【IDEAL FOR CLEANING PET HAIR】Electrostatic rubber Bristles acts like a magnet to absorb debris and hair, during the cleaning process, debris and hair won't be blown into the air. The rubber bristles scrape down and ball the hair from carpets, effectively cleans hair, dirt, fur, dust and other debris on any floor surface.
【BUILT IN SQUEEGEE EDGE】 With build in squeegee edge helps wipe away water or liquid spills on windows, showers, and windshields. Cleans garden, balcony, patio, floor, car with ease.
【Easy to clean and maintain】Pet Hair Rubber Broom head is washable, Wash away dirt from the bristle just by rinsing it on tap water. You may also use soap to clean.

【TELESCOPIC HANDLE】Stop straining your back, the handle length of the pet hair rubber broom is adjustable and can be extended by 24-45 inches. Suitable for people of different heights, it can also be shortened for ease of kids' use.
【PET BRUSH COMBINATION】Pet Hair Removal Broom and Lint Brush Combo, portable design easily cleans loose hair and removes fluff from car seats, floors and cushions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Conliwell Rubber Pet Hair Removal Brush with Squeegee on Amazon, and it's a game-changer for my cleaning routine. Here's my detailed review:Versatile Cleaning PowerThe Conliwell brush is a powerhouse when it comes to handling pet hair, lint, and more. Its versatile design makes it an excellent tool for various cleaning needs around the house.Efficient Pet Hair RemovalFor pet owners like me, this brush is a lifesaver. It efficiently attracts and captures pet hair from carpets, furniture, and car interiors, keeping living spaces clean and hygienic.Portable and LightweightThe portability of this lint remover is a standout feature. Its lightweight design makes it easy to carry around, making it ideal for home, car, or on-the-go use. The compact size ensures convenient storage.Durable ConstructionBuilt with durable rubber, this brush can handle regular use. The material is effective in lifting lint and pet hair without causing damage to surfaces, adding to its overall value.Easy to CleanCleaning the Conliwell brush is a breeze. The rubber bristles are easily wiped clean, and any collected lint or pet hair can be quickly removed. Low maintenance ensures it's always ready for use.Squeegee for Added UtilityThe included squeegee is a fantastic addition, enhancing the brush's functionality for tackling liquid messes. From spills on countertops to cleaning windows, it proves to be a versatile and convenient feature.Ergonomic GripThe ergonomic grip makes this brush comfortable to hold and maneuver. The user-friendly design ensures a pleasant and efficient cleaning experience without causing hand fatigue.In conclusion, the Conliwell Rubber Pet Hair Removal Brush with Squeegee is a reliable and versatile cleaning tool. Its durable construction, ease of use, and added squeegee make it a valuable addition to any cleaning toolkit. Whether you're a pet owner or simply looking for an effective lint remover, this brush delivers on its promises. Highly recommended for its convenience and reliable performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well on soft hair
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and picks up a lot of human and cat hair. My cat had long cotton like hair and I have cheap renter's carpet. May not be ideal for coarse hair or plush carpet. Works for me tho. Decent product for my need and bonus hand brush works well on bedding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this kit.
reviews.reviewText: We have a Pekingese who leaves hair everywhere and the vaccuum couldn't clean it. This thing really works! The brush is nice to. Good for carpets, couches, stairs...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very flimsy and cheap. I spent so much effort trying to scrape the carpet and no hair came out. It is a flimsy rubber paddle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works great on carpet and hardwood floors. I use it to take my outside rugs as well and it really grabs the hair. I use both sides on all areas.I have a long hair shepherd so use it couple times a day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This broom picks up my pet hair really well and also easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well, I mean....
reviews.reviewText: Well, I mean it works.... Just I cannot get it to even pull up as much hair as the others who have reviewed and shared photos or videos. Now consider I do vacuum and shampoo my carpets often, but I also have 2 cats with very long hair. Also have 2 large standard poodles however, they are purebreds so they don't shed.So I guess by all rights the rubber brush for carpet does work.I gave it only 4 stars because the handle/pole feels flimsy to the point that my husband is afraid he will break it and I don't want to put much force behind it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The handle is too short!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using rubber brooms like this for 20+ years. They're great for wooden floors and last ages. But eventually the rubber around where the brush joins the handle will deteriorate and the broom becomes useless. I ordered this and another version, this one was slightly more expensive. It has a very thick brush head, which I'm not entirely sure improves the product because it makes it heavier and I don't feel it gathers any more debris. But mostly, I can't deal with the really short handle. I'm not tall, but have to bend too much to get a good sweep, the other broom I also ordered has a handle that is 11 inches longer and is just right (it's a lot lighter too, which I prefer).

reviews.reviewTitle: Tal cual la imagen es lo que se envía.
reviews.reviewText: Excelente aliado para limpiar los pelos de mascotas. Recomendado.

I guess I thought it would be easier than vacuuming, but it takes far too many strokes to gather the hair up off of my short pile carpets. it does work well, however to gather hair up off of the couch covers, etc. Overall somewhat disappointed with the ability to work quickly on carpets.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent for washing the deck of your boat
reviews.reviewText: The plastic bristles are firm enough to get crap off but it’s not going to damage your paint. Highly recommended for cleaning boat decks.
Cumple los objetivos de diseño en el área de limpieza

El producto es bueno, se ve resistente, en general quede satisfecha, solamente pensé que atraería mas los pelos de las mascotas y cabello (razón por la cual lo compre), anteriormente tenia otra marca y ese tengo la impresión de que jalaba super bien pelos y cabello, sin embargo cumple con su función solo que le batallas un poquitín mas. le doy un 9/10
